column4: hey.... I'm trying to setup vmware-server on my server, and I'm trying to understand the networking setup... I have a server have many static IP addresses on there (i.e. eth0:0-eth0:30), and I want to assign one to a vmware server... do I use bridged or NAT?
so how do I assign which one the bridged one takes?
if you want to set up to use a certine interaface, you want bridged...
not sure on that... it should be in the vmware manuals on net... they may be able to help you more on the vmware channel... (i think we have one)
